scripts.postinstall: python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\python -m pip install --upgrade pip && venv\Scripts\python -m pip install --only-binary=all -r requirements.txt
scripts.install-deps: python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\python -m pip install --upgrade pip && venv\Scripts\python -m pip install --only-binary=all -r requirements.txt
